attributes.action: Create a Contitution and bill of rights, democratically implemented, created, apointed and amended by vote.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Only the UK born should have the right to vote amendments. And it can only be used by UK born individuals. It should protect and ensure us. The right to free speach. The right to say no to a culture we wish not to imbrace, give us the freedom over the tyrinay of the world give us hope and sancutary. Knowing our govenment is bound by the laws created by we the people. Knowing only a public vote can change it. To create identity and set it in stone who we are. So we are fearless and free to say no we dont what that or this, to say this is the UK and we are who we are like it or leave. To make people aware of who we are before coming here and trying to change us. To show our love for our nation and our Soverign Queen.

rejection.details: Your petition may no longer be relevant. Please read the PM's proposals for consitutional reform http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19582
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
